column2: Skechers Girls Black Bella Ballerina Flats
column24:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • She enjoys twirling around and you are scared that she will hurt herself. This pair of flats from Skechers comes from the Bella Ballerina collection that allows little girls to enjoy themselves as a ballet performer.

  • Round toed
column25:
black Mary Jane flats with diagonal Velcro closure and low top styling
Leather upper with frills
column27:
glitter print and branding
Soft inner with a cushioned footbed
column28:
branding at the heel of the footbed
Tough rubber outsole with a slightly arched midfoot
column30:
grooves and a rotatable pivot point at forefoot that allows spinning
Please exercise caution and follow instructions given with the shoe
Warranty: 3 months
